project_descr: The projects’ main objective is to improve the capacities of the UNDP Country Office to design relevant responsive policies based on the proper analytical assessment processes

outputs.output_descr: The project will enhance the substantive capacity of UNDP country office and its management to respond in a timely, adequate and flexible manner to the identified needs of the Kosovo institutions
